website_summaries.verdict: The quality of this set will surprise you and can improve your game as well.
pros: A set of 7 clubs that is backed by longtime golfers as well as beginners
These clubs can wear in quickly and form to your own unique golf rhythms
We love the lightweight bag, as do many customers
cons: The drivers may dent and if so, contact customer service immediately

website_summaries.verdict: For those new to golf, it's a nice price for a starter set, but some players want more clubs.
pros: Both left- and right-handed sets available
Set includes a driver, a hybrid wood, three irons, a putter, and a bag
Graphite shafts are easy to swing
Bag is of a nice quality, offering plenty of pockets
Hybrid wood helps novices with solid ball striking
cons: Set is missing some key clubs

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginning the game
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife who has just begun taking lessons but has never played golf before. I think it has all the necessary clubs for a beginner to play a round of golf with. The materials, balance and feel of the clubs are not quite the same as high-end clubs, but they are very decent and the price for the entire set is less than I've paid for single clubs. After watching her hit them a couple of times at the range I would recommend them over buying an older, used set or some of the other beginner sets I looked at for her.
customer_reviews.author: whiterockron

customer_reviews.title: Great value all the clubs you need. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at all kinds of clubs but decided to get Callaway and glad I did. The clubs and bag are well made and does the job I also like the fact that it's not pink or purple. The whole bag and clubs are light to carry, which is important to me as I walk the course. Especially if you wear it like a backpack you don't even feel it. I am 5'5 and the regular length fits perfectly. 8/20/2018 update: still love my clubs but after playing several games, now I am looking for a few more clubs to add: 3 wood and Approach wedge or pitching wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Amac

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter set, but It's only 7 clubs in the set the other 4 pieces are 3 head covers and the bag..
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves them. The quality is very good for such an affordable set. It isn't a full set, but does have all the clubs a beginner will need to take lessons or get out there and play. The included stand bag is also very nice. Can't go wrong with these, I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken 1

customer_reviews.title: He recommended this set--has all the clubs he thought I would ...
customer_reviews.text: New golfer. Husband is practically a pro. He recommended this set--has all the clubs he thought I would need. Bag is light weight but well made. Clubs seem well balanced and good weight to me...but how would I know? ;) Husband, expert, says they are very good. I like that that they are NOT pink--seems like most starter clubs for woman are--that's silly.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent modern beginners club set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent modern beginners club set. Graphite shafts, generous heads and a hybrid included. Just enough clubs to play while learning or coming back from a 15 year hibernation (that's me!). Clubs are a little long for me since I'm 5'3" but I just hold them short. Can't beat the price quality ratio. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Feet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set
customer_reviews.text: I own a new set of Ping clubs that cost well over $1,000. When I ordered these clubs, I did not expect much, but I was very surprised by the quality of this set. These are great looking clubs in a great looking bag. They are a bargain. The quality is obviously not the same as a set of Pings, where one driver costs more than this entire set, but based on the way these clubs look and feel, by the time you actually wear them out it will be time for an upgrade anyway. This is only an initial impression, I will update my review if I run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Svoboda

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for myself love them. Still learning the sport but seems like ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for myself love them. Still learning the sport but seems like a great set to start out with. I did plenty of research prior to buying my first set and I am not disappointed at all! I also bought the men’s set for my son and he loves it says it is “Awsome” he is 18
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set at a very reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a beginner golfer who was frustrated always having to use the "loaner" clubs available when we went to a local driving range or golf club. We haven't really used these yet, but they look and feel great. They are light but feel solid and seem like an excellent set for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Nevias

customer_reviews.title: Good hand feel - comfortable for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I am not a good golfer. But I wanted a respectable set of clubs to practice with and improve my game. This set fills that! It makes me feel like I’ve got a nice set so that’s a real psychological advantage.... I can’t think of any negative about this set. If you are a beginner this set is a very good choice !
customer_reviews.author: Aksmile

customer_reviews.title: Made by Callaway & the Price was so reasonable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loved the clubs. They are so light weight to carry as well as the bag that comes with it and the bag has so many compartments to it it’s great all your little golf incidentals.
customer_reviews.author: Ora Alger

customer_reviews.title: Calloway women's golf set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter after reading other reviews. They are a beautiful set. She is 5'1". She easily chokes up on these clubs. I know she will have them for a while. She loves them and finds it easier to get the ball in the air. My friend who is a weekly golfer says this is a great set and the price was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: ANNA

customer_reviews.title: Great ladies set
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set, my wife loves it! Same set they sell in the golf shops, but for a much lower price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Pinson II

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I’m an intermediate golfer and this is a good set of clubs for my skill level. I’ve had them for a year and they have held up really well. If you’re new to golf this is a great set to buy. They are not junk and you’ll be able to learn the game with these clubs without investing too much in case you don’t like golf.
customer_reviews.author: Rxshana

customer_reviews.title: 11 peice set?
customer_reviews.text: Good clubs for my personal use. I'm not a great golfer by any means, but I enjoy going out 7-10 times per season. Be aware though, they count the club covers in the "11 peice set" claim.
customer_reviews.author: Dear

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that my husband ordered these! They are a great beginner set of clubs. Wish there was an open box for my husband! Very pleased with the clubs and the open-box price!
customer_reviews.author: John McInnis

customer_reviews.title: Great First Set
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter who wanted to play. Great value and truly great set of clubs!
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Good Clubs, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought these clubs and they are a great starter set for her. We both like the clubs and they seem good quality for the price. I would recommend these to any beginners looking to start playing. We haven't had any issues and have hit the clubs a couple dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Myers

customer_reviews.title: The bag is great, too
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a few lessons so far, but I've been loving this set. The bag is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: N. Frisk

customer_reviews.title: She love the fit and that they are not pink or ...
customer_reviews.text: Got here for my wife and her first lessons.. She love the fit and that they are not pink or purple!
customer_reviews.author: brian d. mcdonell

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson is thrilled with his first complete set of ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson is thrilled with his first complete set of clubs. He is hitting them really well. Only 12 years old but been playing for 3+ years with just a few old clubs cut down for his height. Now is ready for his own set. These should serve him for a couple years until another growth spurt.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter set dented the heel of the driver at ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter set dented the heel of the driver at driving range first day but no effect on performance. Great for the price Irons are very nice. I will be replacing the woods after a season or two
customer_reviews.author: Sal C.

customer_reviews.title: women's Golf Set
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my wife's bday next month. It looks really nice withj a great bag and head covers.
customer_reviews.author: joe natale

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and balanced.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but it arrived complete, easy to unpack, I love the black blue and white coloring, and the clubs feel marvelously balanced. Can't wait for my first golf lesson!
customer_reviews.author: R. Corff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a beginner and they have been exactly what I needed. Because of the price I didn't have to worry about accidentally hitting the ground. The bag is even comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: alaskanRN

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for beginning golfers
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my girlfriend. They are perfect for beginning golfers
customer_reviews.author: Benton

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife for Mother's Day. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: f911slm

customer_reviews.title: Just tried these out today and I loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried these out today and I loved them!! I would highly recommend getting the 7 club set as too many clubs can be confusing for a beginner golfer.
customer_reviews.author: B Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Love these clubs
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs. I'm an absolute beginner, in my 50's and the clubs are well made, the bag is lightweight & good quality clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Starr R. Diethorn

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Has everything a beginner woman golfer needs and bag is so lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great set of beginner clubs for ladies. Callaway quality set for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of clubs. Can't wait to use them this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia L.

customer_reviews.title: Found this strata set at a great price, comes with all the essential clubs
customer_reviews.text: Started playing golf more often with my husband, I was playing with some really old heavy clubs. Found this strata set at a great price, comes with all the essential clubs, and a bag. So I thought I'd give them a try. These clubs are lightweight, durable and easy to swing. My golf game improved the first time I used them! The clubs are good looking, and a pretty blue! I absolutely love these clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Great golf clubs for women
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set! Love the clubs and the bag 👍
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these for my wife, who is returning ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife, who is returning to golf after many years away from the game. She loves the feel of the clubs and is excited about using them this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A decent starter set. Wish it had a pitching wedge though.
customer_reviews.author: Tmoney

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great intro set and for the sale price was a can't miss item! Callaway always delivers on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not many clubs
customer_reviews.text: club quality is fine, there are just many missing parts. Item description is deceiving since head covers and bag count as "pieces" of the set. Unable to purchase missing clubs individually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase. The clubs were perfect for my grand daughter & delivery was on time as promised
customer_reviews.author: dean w varney

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set. My only complaint is that the head covers are super cheap and don't really work well... But I can't complain to much because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend on Prime day so I got an awesome deal on them. They are perfect for anybody that is showing interest in golf and want a set where they can learn the game and their swing at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Brett L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice and Great Price for Calaway made
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my sons girlfriend as she is a new golfer. She loves them and said it improved her game. The bag needs to be a little more girl like in my opionion.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over my old set of hand-me-down clubs. Love having a sand wedge. Old set had a pw but no sw. Love the lightweight bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Purchases July 2015 and still enjoying it. Am a beginner and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great beginners set. Bought this on prime day so super happy with the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kasik

customer_reviews.title: Played with them this weekend and loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I've played for years and upgraded to this set. Played with them this weekend and loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very pleased with the set and the ordering process was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for beginners who don’t want to spend too much for their first set. Comes with the most used clubs and was a good fit for my girlfriend who is 5’7”.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey McMath

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I saw a huge difference in my drives. They are comfortable and the bag has the double shoulder strap for easy carrying. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Stankus

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on prime day. Great beginner set, my coworkers mentioned they were pretty nice clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lotz

customer_reviews.title: A good set for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: O buy this set for my wife and she really love it. It comes with the basic clubs for begginers
customer_reviews.author: Simon Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: GREAT club set for a beginner. I love these clubs! I'm 5'10" and find them to be the right height. Being a beginner, I didn't know what to look for in a used club, and didn't want to purchase a big, complete set for many hundreds of dollars. This was the perfect compromise, and I can add clubs later as I improve my game.
customer_reviews.author: Westie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my girlfriend who is just learning how ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my girlfriend who is just learning how to play. She loves the clubs. The bag is also exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Z E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for someone who is beginning the game of golf.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N Jelinski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a starter set
customer_reviews.text: Use these every week. Great balance and lightweight. Perfect for a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: madison gann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok starter set but I would've expected better quality from Callaway.
customer_reviews.author: Diggs31

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for the price. Solid set of clubs and a very nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT Women's clubs!
customer_reviews.text: We were super disappointed when we opened the box and it was men's clubs.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set and absolutely love them. So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am just learning how to golf and had been using my husbands clubs.I bought this set and absolutely love them. So comfortable, light and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are amazing. I like two of the clubs even better ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my second home. I didnt want to spend a lot and was not expecting a lot. WOW was I surprised, they are amazing. I like two of the clubs even better than my much more expensive set (the 5 wood and the 5 hybrid). It only got 4 stars becasue the putter is awful. Way too weighted for a ladies set. I would highly recommend this set even as a primary set for someone who is learning.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Came on great shape, awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: Came on great shape, awesome bag. The drivers are a bit long for me at 5'3" but the rest of the clubs are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clubs for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a set of clubs for a beginner. Arrived before it was promised. Very well packaged. Extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these clubs
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs. Got these from my husband as a gift. They are great quality as well as the bag. I am in LOVE with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for the price. Bag is also supper nice has a backpack style strap.
customer_reviews.author: cindy duisen

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for her needs as a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old daughter. They were perfect for her needs as a beginner. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: SBennett

customer_reviews.title: These Clubs are Great
customer_reviews.text: My old set of clubs are 40 years old and I have decided to take the game up again after many years. Oh, these clubs are nice! I wish I would have had them years ago. I have been practicing a lot and hope to get on the course soon! A great deal for the quality of the clubs you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybirdy

customer_reviews.title: for the price id like to see callaway step up and support the womens ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for the wife, she likes them and enjoys using them on the course. for the price id like to see callaway step up and support the womens golf game but for now, these are good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: I can hit the ball a mile!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new clubs. I can hit the ball a mile with my new driver! The clubs are light weight, good looking and very efficient. I'm not a serious golfer. I just like to have fun. I plan on using them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: I've golfed several times with these clubs. They are a great price. I like that they are easy to hit. The bag is nice. I would recommend these for someone who likes to golf but doesn't want to spend a lot if money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My first golf purchase and I love them. Just as described
customer_reviews.text: My first golf purchase and I love them. Just as described. I wanted to be a dedicated student of golf but did not want to spend a lot for my first set. These are excellent. I have used them twice a week for a month now and I don't regret my choice one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Gave this set to my wife for a Christmas present ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this set to my wife for a Christmas present. She just used them and loves them. I may now be a golf widower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag smells horribly
customer_reviews.text: Nice clubs but the bag has a very strong and nasty smell. I have to put it outside of the house hoping that such smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: MH Alves

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter set for my wife at our country club. Other members have same set.

customer_reviews.title: ... just starting to play golf and this set is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting to play golf and this set is perfect for me.

customer_reviews.title: Got two 5 woods and no 3 wood
customer_reviews.text: I got two 5 woods and no 3 wood. Great buy though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful clubs. May be all in my head but my game seems to be better.

customer_reviews.title: The bag and clubs are good, but my driver got two major dents after ...
customer_reviews.text: I golf about once a week and I wish I would have bought a different set. The bag and clubs are good, but my driver got two major dents after two days of golf. I had to buy a new driver. Defeated the point of buying new clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No clubs 11 piece expensive for the lack of clubs. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mogan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these clubs. They are just what I needed to enjoy the game of golf.
customer_reviews.author: Sassyfrom ND

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS SET
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible purchase. Who wants an 11 piece set and why would it even be offered? I bought it by mistake wanting a standard 14 club set. Then its impossible to find and buy the missing clubs to make it a 14 club set. Buyer beware...sad part is the clubs are nice but worthless without missing clubs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 11pcs (misleading - head covers are included as 3 of ...
customer_reviews.text: 11pcs (misleading - head covers are included as 3 of 11pcs). Clubs OK. Need to purchase more clubs to play a full round. Starter set only.
customer_reviews.author: sjohnson

customer_reviews.title: very misleading seller posting, you can't play a course with this kit,,,
customer_reviews.text: Extremely misleading, has only 7 clubs, absolutely not enough to get on to a real course, very .misleading caption (11 pieces) pl don't buy this and consider picking other brands that offer a full set.. and doesn't say Callaway anywhere .:(... feeling ripped
customer_reviews.author: treeza_north

product_meta.title: Callaway Women's Strata Complete Golf Set, Prior Generation (11-Piece, Right Hand)
product_meta.description:
A Full Set With A Great Combination Of Distance and Forgiveness Right Out Of The Box. Offers the performance women want for their game and an eye-catching look that suits their style.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A Full Set With A Great Combination Of Distance and Forgiveness Right Out Of The Box. Offers the performance women want for their game and an eye-catching look that suits their style.
feature_bullets: Driver, 5W: Woods have a forgiving sweet spot and a graphite shaft for exceptional distance (Headcovers included)
Hybrid (5H): Designed for versatility and forgiveness on shots where you would usually hit a difficult long iron; (Headcover included)
Irons/Wedges (7,9,SW): Perimeter weighting and progressive sole width technology for improved control
Putter: Mallet with T-Style alignment to help give you incredible accuracy
Stand Bag: The lightweight, durable stand bag comes with five convenient pockets, an additional cooler pocket, a rain hood and a backpack strap system
A great alternative to difficult long irons, allowing for more confidence on a variety of shots (headcover included)
Driver, 5W: Woods have a forgiving sweet spot and a graphite shaft for exceptional distance (Headcovers included)
Hybrid (5H): Designed for versatility and forgiveness on shots where you would usually hit a difficult long iron; (Headcover included)
Irons/Wedges (7,9,SW): Perimeter weighting and progressive sole width technology for improved control
Putter: Mallet with T-Style alignment to help give you incredible accuracy
Stand Bag: The lightweight, durable stand bag comes with five convenient pockets, an additional cooler pocket, a rain hood and a backpack strap system
